reviews.review_msg: Dr. Rose is basically irrelevant for this class; your TA will be your 1st line of contact and they'll be grading everything you do. Lectures are useless because they focus on the past week's content that you'll have already written a 600-word paper on. SO many assignments and grading criteria are VERY vague (be ready to do whatever your TA says).
boring prof. not a hard class..totally average, i almost fell asleep from boredom. talks about himself a lot. Get a good TA and this class is bearable

I crammed the entire thing overnight and still got a B so... No excuses guys. He's pretty funny from like the 2 times I talked to him. Also you SHOULD keep up with the lectures because there is a research report to write... Since it's his first time hosting 201W some parts were rough and not clear, but he fixed those mistakes.
Dr Leavitt was absolutely phenomenal. Very approachable, kind, respectable, and wants you to succeed. Every assignment and the final is fair. Don't need to read textbook, his slides cover it all.

Dr. Leavitt is awesome. His lectures are entertaining and comprehensive and he posts slides so if you can't attend its fine. We a group project, but the final research report on the group project was individual, so your not totally screwed if you get bad group members. The final was super fair too, he wants students to do well and won't trick you.
